price: （我确已派遣）易卜拉欣，当日，他对他的宗族说：“你们应当崇拜安拉，并当敬畏他，这对于你们是更好的。如果你们知道。
arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ib'rāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ittaqūhu dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
